description:
BeyondTrust is a place where you can bring your purpose to life through the work that you do, creating a safer world through our cyber security SaaS portfolio.

Our culture of flexibility, trust, and continual learning means you will be recognized for your growth, and for the impact you make on our success. You will be surrounded by people who challenge, support, and inspire you to be the best version of yourself.

The Role:

Join us as a Senior Data Scientist and play a pivotal role in launching and enhancing BeyondTrust SAAS solutions. In this role, you'll support the enhancement and creation of threat detections by utilizing large-scale data workloads and applying statistics, machine learning, natural language processing, and more. You'll be at the forefront of designing, developing, and maintaining models whose output will be directly consumed by enterprises to improve their cloud security and identity posture.

What You’ll Do:
• Strategic Solution Design: Own the vision around all data science product components or features, maintaining alignment with the overall product strategy in partnership with threat research and data engineering.
• Technical Execution: Design, develop, and maintain model pipelines for detecting threats, generating additional identity insights, and powering security recommendations.
• Communication & Collaboration: Effectively communicate with stakeholders, scoping and ensuring problem alignment with organizational objectives.
• Innovation at the intersection of Security and Data Science: Periodically work with product partners, patent attorneys, and content editors to propose and generate IP.

What Skill You Will Need:
• Depth in statistical modeling and/or machine learning.
• Must be ready to talk through the technical details of the models you have deployed!
• Proficiency in solving unsupervised, semi-supervised, and supervised learning problems using PySpark or other modern scalable scientific programming languages.
• Demonstrate the ability to wrangle big data and code-up models on the fly!
• Comfortable thinking about threat landscape challenges and directions.
• Self-driven and determined to stay connected with state-of-the-art AI.
• Preferred:
• Knowledge and passion for graph problems.
• Knowledge and passion with large language models.
• Track record of contributing to the scientific and security communities.

What You’ll Bring:
• 2+ years of experience supporting threat researchers.
• 4+ years’ experience delivering and supporting enterprise-ready data science solutions.
• Experience working on an Agile team in a continuous integration and development environment.
• Experience partnering with product or program management teams.

Better Together

Diversity. Inclusion. They’re more than just words for us. They are the guiding values of how we build our teams, cultivate leaders, and create a culture where people feel connected.

We take care of our employees so they can take care of our customers. Customers who come from all walks of life just like us. We hire incredible people from diverse backgrounds because when we are different together, we are stronger together.

About Us

BeyondTrust is the worldwide leader in intelligent identity and access security, enabling organizations to protect identities, stop threats, and deliver dynamic access. We are leading the charge in innovating identity-first security and are trusted by 20,000 customers, including 75 of the Fortune 100, plus a global ecosystem of partners.

Learn more at www.beyondtrust.com.

#LI-BS1

BeyondTrust focuses on Cloud Computing, Security, Enterprise Security, Software, and Cyber Security. Their company has offices in Australia, Canada, Dubai, Singapore, and United States. They have a large team that's between 501-1000 employees.

You can view their website at http://www.beyondtrust.com or find them on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.
